subject: feat: add default filters to exclude merges and start from Dec 2025
body:
First-time visitors now see sensible defaults: merge commits excluded
and date range starting from 2025-12-01. Defaults only apply when no
localStorage or URL params exist, so returning users keep their choices.

Config is in FILTER_DEFAULTS in js/state.js for easy adjustment.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01C7qfuPrYhWtPw1gokenMjc
title: add default filters to exclude merges and start from Dec 2025
